column4: Anybody know if there is a terminal based irc installed with Edgy by default?  It just dawned on me I might need it if I can only manage a terminal ssh connection.
there is irssi and bitchx but im not sure if they are defuault
Doesn't appear to be the case, but I will go get one of them
i suggest irssi, i like the interface but i guess anyone will do
